product_name: Kiss My Face Face Factor SPF 50 Sunscreen - 2 fl. oz.
long_description: Kiss My Face Face Factor SPF 50 sunscreen provides UVA and UVB protection and is specially formulated for your face and neck. Green tea and licorice extracts help fight damaging free radicals; natural hyaluronic acid, aloe and cucumber extract help hydrate and soothe your skin. Fragrance-free formula is water resistant. Biodegradable sunscreen is paraben free and phthalate free; contains no artificial fragrances. Kiss My Face Face Factor SPF 50 sunscreen is not tested on animals.
short_description: Kiss My Face Face Factor SPF 50 sunscreen provides UVA and UVB protection and is specially formulated for your face and neck.
